reg:regulation.reg:title: Wildlife Management Areas Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 285/2018, December 17, 2018]

bcl:section.bcl:text: The areas of land under the minister's administration named and described in the Schedule are designated as wildlife management areas.
All the land in the Green Mountain Wildlife Management Area is designated as a critical wildlife area for the Vancouver Island marmot (Marmota vancouverensis).

The whole wildlife management area containing approximately 915 hectares.
